overall.description: Mask rows of a 2D array that contain masked values.

axis.description: The array to mask.  If not a MaskedArray instance (or if no array elements are masked).  The result is a MaskedArray with mask set to nomask (False). Must be a 2D array.

a.description: Axis along which to perform the operation. If None, applies to a flattened version of the array.
